definition: to talk at length/to waste one's breath/variant of 廢話|废话[fei4 hua4]
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: That all costs, are an excuse.
And for everyone who had bothered to spend a little time in this little space of mine.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝大家願意花一點時間來這裏閱讀我所寫的費話。
